name: arrayUnshift
description: This function adds one or more elements to the beginning of the original array and returns the length of the modified array.

params.name: array
params.description: The original array to be added to.

params.name: object
params.description: The new object to be added.

coldfusion.notes: The full function was added in ACF 2021, but the member function appears to work in ACF 2018 (likely using Java).

links.title: ArrayPop(), ArrayShift(), And ArraySliceSafe() In Lucee CFML 5.3.6.61
links.description: Blog post from Ben Nadel detailing new Array functions in Lucee.

links.title: LDEV-3137 - ACF2021 - add function ArrayUnShift
links.description: Lucee Bug Report to add ACF function to Lucee.

examples.title: Example with simple values
examples.description: Add a new element to an array.

examples.title: Using a member function
examples.description: This is the same example as above, but using a member function on the array instead of a standalone function.
